price: 75. Et ceux qui comparaîtront devant Lui en croyants, ayant accompli les bonnes œuvres, ceux-là auront (mérité) les plus hauts rangs.
arabic: وَمَن يَأۡتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنٗا قَدۡ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلۡعُلَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waman yatihi mu'minan qad ʿamila al-ṣāliḥāti fa-ulāika lahumu al-darajātu al-ʿulā
